string.name: instruction_view
string.p:
1. Give permissions to access SMS and Contact.
2. Press Add Contact Button to add contact from phone.
3. Select contact from whom you want to receive and send message.
4. Now Press Done Button.

string.name: description
string.p: This Application allow user to receive and send message to contact which are select. This service runs Automatically. Messages are received and read only if it belongs to selected contact. And it forward messages automatically to selected contact only. Thus making user work easier.

resources.string: Add Contact to start SMS service
